author: sebb
msg: Move to same package as Maven gpg plugin since the intention is to merge the code
Also target the 1.5 release (currently only SNAPSHOT) because that uses annotations
So we can drop our local copy of AbstractGpgMojo

author: nick
msg: Changelog update, and a more likely/helpful default release notes

author: rvesse
msg: Add support for a --basic-auth argument in Fuseki that can be used to have basic auth configured using a Jetty realm file in lieu of a full blown Jetty config.  It configures a single role fuseki to which users must belong in order to access any services on the server.  If --jetty-config is used the --basic-auth argument is ignored.
With this functionality in place added unit tests that verify JENA-475

author: nick
msg: Fix bug #54233 - Some HPSF documents require UnicodeStrings to be 4-byte aligned, spot these from the otherwise invalid length
